name: netpong
description: A networked version of the classic Pong, based on the Incheon game server

scripts.postinstall: browserify src/client/clientMain.js -i nodejs-physijs -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ]
scripts.watchify: watchify src/client/clientMain.js -i nodejs-physijs -o dist/bundle.js -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ]

author: Opher Vishnia
